welcome_subtitle: Hannun hankali na atomatik na shirye-shirye
not_configured_yet: Ba a saita tsarin ba tukuna. Wannan saitin maye zai taimaka muku wajen haɓaka tsarin ku a cikin ƴan matakai.
system_config_include_demo: Haɗa demo tare da aikin na'urar kwaikwayo
empty_group: Babu kayayyaki a cikin wannan rukunin.
cronwizard_schedule_set_slot_end:
Farawa a {{start}}.
 Saita ƙarshen ramin lokaci.
cronwizard_bindings_define_types_and_mod: Ƙayyade nau'o'i da kayayyaki waɗanda ke ƙarƙashin wannan jadawalin (na zaɓi)
cronwizard_action_set_action_to_execute: Saita mataki don aiwatar da abubuwan da suka faru na wannan taron
cronwizard_action_preset_every_occurrenc: A kan kowane abin da ya faru
cronwizard_action_schedule_variable_hint: Yi amfani da @{{name}} azaman mai canzawa a cikin maganganun cron ko amfani da Scheduler.IsScheduling("@{{name}}") a cikin shirye-shiryen sarrafa kansa don yin la'akari da wannan taron.
enable_to_run_program: Kunna shirin don gudanar da shi
main_code_empty_note: Lambar "Babban" babu komai. Yi amfani da editan "Kayan gani" don samar da wannan lambar: - Buɗe nau'in "Shirin" daga palette na umarni a hagu - Jawo wani toshe nau'in "Main" a cikin filin aikin na'urar gani - Ƙara a ciki da sauran katangar lambar don aiwatar da ayyuka da dabaru na wannan shirin Shirin "Main" na iya zama ko dai yana gudana da hannu ko farawa ta atomatik bisa ga yanayin ƙarshe da aka bayar a cikin lambar saiti.
setup_code_empty_note: Lambar "Setup" babu komai. Yi amfani da editan "Kayan gani" don samar da wannan lambar: - Buɗe nau'in "Shirin" daga palette na umarni a hagu - Jawo wani toshe nau'in "Saitu" a cikin filin aiki na lambar gani - Ƙara a cikinsa wasu katangar lambar don sanin yanayin da zai haifar da "Babban" code kisa Wannan lambar tana samun kimanta duk lokacin da wani sabon abu ya faru kuma aƙalla sau ɗaya a minti daya.
capture_commands_description: Ƙara duk umarnin da aka yi da hannu akan widget din zuwa shirin.

16.Title: Ƙwaƙwalwar Matsayi
16.Description: Ajiye kuma tuno matakin dimmer na ƙarshe.
16.HomeGenie.LevelMemory: Tuna matakin haske na ƙarshe lokacin da aka kunna

26.Title: Launuka masu launi
26.Description: Misali Haɗin fitilun Philips Hue ta amfani da HTTP API (V1). Tsohuwar mai amfani don haɗawa da gadar shine "sabon mai haɓakawa" kuma ya kamata a riga an kunna shi.
26.ConfigureOptions.BridgeAddress: Adireshin IP na Philips Hue Bridge (V1).

34.Title: Hasashen Yanayi
34.Description: Yanayi da bayanin hasashen daga sabis ɗin Taswirar Yanayi. Don kunna wannan widget din shigar da maɓallin API mai aiki. Bi umarni a https://openweathermap.org/appid don samun maɓallin API kyauta.

77.Title: MQTT Network
77.Description: Haɗa zuwa dillali na MQTT don amfani da aikace-aikacen Panel na HomeGenie daga ko'ina ta Intanet ko don haɗa na'urorin HomeGenie akan hanyar sadarwar MQTT iri ɗaya.
77.MQTT.SensorPublish: Buga abubuwan da wannan rukunin ya fitar

78.Title: Smart Thermostat
78.Description: Yi amfani da kowane firikwensin zafin jiki da canji mai wayo don aiwatar da aikin thermostat.
78.ConfigureOptions.EnsureCommandDelivery: Tabbatar da isar da umarni tare da watsawa akai-akai (yanayin bugun jini).

81.Title: Kula da Makamashi
81.Description: Ƙirƙirar ƙididdiga kan yawan kuzari da amfani da na'urori.

82.Title: Yanayin Ajiye Makamashi
82.Description: Rike matakin haske ƙasa da adadin daidaitacce.

88.Title: Generic IP kamara
88.Description: Nuna/ ciyarwar hoton hanya daga kyamarar IP.

90.Title: Tsarin Ƙararrawa na Tsaro
90.Description: Yi amfani da na'urori masu auna firikwensin da sauran na'urori don aiwatar da tsarin ƙararrawa na tsaro.
90.HomeGenie.SecurityTriggerHome: Hakanan yana haifar da lokacin da makamai Gida
90.ConfigureOptions.Email.Recipients: Jerin waƙafi ya raba jerin imel ɗin masu karɓa don sanarwar ƙararrawa
90.ConfigureOptions.System.SirenMaxTime: Sirens max Time ( seconds, 0 = mara iyaka)
90.ConfigureOptions.Trigger.ArmedProgram: Shirin da zai gudana lokacin da makamai
90.ConfigureOptions.Trigger.DisarmedProgram: Shirin da zai gudana lokacin da aka kwance damara
90.ConfigureOptions.Trigger.TriggeredProgra: Shirin da zai gudana lokacin da aka kunna

111.Title: Kanfigareshan Abokin ciniki
111.Description: Yana aiwatar da API don sarrafa bayanan bayanan abokin ciniki waɗanda ake amfani da su don adana saitunan UI da dashboards.

400.Title: Virtual Modules Demo
400.Description: Da hannu saita ƙimar na'urar kama-da-wane.

401.Title: Demo - Juya Kofa
401.Description: Simulates kofa bude/ rufe na demo kofa-taga firikwensin.

402.Title: Demo - An Gano Motsi
402.Description: Yana kwatanta gano motsi na firikwensin demo da yawa.

410.Title: Sensor Simulator
410.Simulator.Sensor.DataFrequency: Na'urar kwaikwayo na fitar da mitar

505.Title: Ikon nesa
505.Description: Sarrafa na'urar ta amfani da nesa (IR ko RF).

142.Title: Asusun Imel
142.Description: Ana adana bayanan asusun imel ɗin da shirye-shiryen tsarin ke amfani da shi don aikawa da karɓar imel.
142.ConfigureOptions.Email.SmtpUserName: 3. Sunan mai amfani na SMTP (na zaɓi)
142.ConfigureOptions.Email.SmtpUseSsl: 6. SMTP uwar garken amfani da SSL

145.Title: Na'urar Wayo
145.Description: Kunna/kashe na'urar bisa ga gano motsi da hasken yanayi.
145.HomeGenie.SmartLights.CheckLuminosity: Ana sarrafa ta ta firikwensin haske (na zaɓi)

8.Title: Halin Launuka na fitowar rana
8.Description: Misali "Sunrise" yanayin yanayin canza launi na LED.
8.Scenarios.SunriseColors: Hanyar haɗi zuwa yanayin Launuka na Rana

910.Title: Gane Abu
910.Description: Gano abubuwa ta amfani da ƙirar YOLO da aka riga aka horar.
910.ML.ObjectDetection.TriggerDetect: Jerin abubuwan da aka raba waƙafi (a cikin Ingilishi) waɗanda zasu kunna ƙararrawa. (misali: cat, kare, mutum, jakar baya, akwati)

911.Title: Ƙimar Matsayi
911.Description: Gano maɓalli ta hanyar ƙididdige matsayi, ta amfani da samfuran ONNX na al'ada ko ƙirar YOLO da aka riga aka horar da ita (takamaiman matsayi na ɗan adam).

912.Title: Rarraba Misali
912.Description: Gano abubuwa da fassarorinsu ta amfani da ƙirar YOLO da aka riga aka horar.

930.Title: Gemini Intent Handler
930.Description: Yana ba da damar sarrafa harshe na halitta don tsarin ku mai wayo ta amfani da Google's Gemini AI. Don kunna wannan fasalin, shigar da maɓallin API mai aiki. Bi umarnin a https://aistudio.google.com/app/apikey don samun maɓallin API kyauta.

931.Title: Gemini Widget Genie
931.Description: Genie AI na ku don ƙirƙirar widget din. Gemini yana ƙarfafa shi, yana taimaka muku rubutawa da gyara HTML, CSS, da lambar JavaScript kai tsaye a cikin editan HomeGenie. Don kunna wannan fasalin, shigar da maɓallin API mai aiki. Bi umarnin a https://aistudio.google.com/app/apikey don samun maɓallin API kyauta.

940.Title: AI na gida
940.Description: Gudanar da LLMs na zamani kai tsaye akan sabar HomeGenie ɗinku. Ya haɗa da cikakken API don sarrafa AI daga wasu shirye-shirye da rubutun.
940.ConfigureOptions.ModelPath: Hanya zuwa fayil na GGUF na gida
940.ConfigureOptions.MaxTurns: Matsakaicin juyi na tarihin hira (0 = babu iyaka)
940.ConfigureOptions.SendContextData: Haɗa jerin na'urori da na'urori masu auna sigina a cikin tambayoyi

575.Title: Manajan Saukewa
575.Description: Sabis mai ƙarfi, mara daidaituwa na HTTP(S) sabis ne da ake samu ta hanyar API mai ƙwazo. Yana kula da cikakken zagayowar saukewa, yana tallafawa dakatarwa/ci gaba (ta amfani da kanun labarai na Range) da kuma sarrafa fayil na ɗan lokaci (.part).

576.Title: Mai sarrafa fayil
576.Description: Sabis mai aminci wanda API ke jagoranta don karantawa da rubuta fayiloli a cikin babban fayil ɗin bayanai na shirin. Yana tallafawa abubuwan da ke cikin tsarin binary da UTF-8 ta hanyar umarnin ReadText da WriteText na musamman.

577.Title: Sabis na Tarihin Hira
577.Description: Sabis na HomeGenie mai tsakiya don sarrafawa da dagewa da rajistar tattaunawa ta AI. Ta hanyar API mai haɗin kai (System.Utility/ChatHistory), yana samar da girgije da LLM na gida tare da mahallin da aka raba, ajiyar JSON ta atomatik, da kuma sarrafa tarihin lokaci-lokaci.

578.Title: Injin Yanayi
578.Description: Sabis na tsakiya don samar da saurin AI mai ƙarfi. Yana cike samfura tare da jerin na'urori masu sarrafawa da yanayin tsarin kai tsaye (yanayi, kuzari, na'urori masu auna firikwensin), yana tabbatar da cikakken wayar da kan jama'a game da AI a gida a ainihin lokaci.

570.Title: Mai Kula da Bayanai
570.Description: Sabis na nazari mai zurfi don ƙididdigar tsarin tarihi. Yana ba da damar dawo da bayanai masu motsi na jerin lokaci tare da matattara masu sarrafa sigina da aka gina a ciki (Matsakaicin Matsakaici Mai Sauƙi, Matsakaicin Motsi, Savitzky-Golay) don samar da bayanai masu tsabta da santsi don jadawali da sa ido kan tsarin.

571.Title: Kididdigar Amfani da Makamashi
571.Description: Yana ci gaba da sa ido, tattarawa, da kuma yin rikodin bayanan amfani da makamashi (W/h) a lokaci-lokaci. Yana aiwatar da cikakken API don bincika bayanai na tarihi da kuma bincika su.

572.Title: Misalin Taswirar Keke
572.Description: Misalin mai samar da jadawalin da ke nuna jadawalin kek tare da bayanai marasa canzawa.

573.Title: Amfani da Makamashi na Mako-mako
573.Description: Jadawalin sanduna wanda ke nuna matsakaicin amfani da Watts/Awa na kowace rana ta mako (Litinin-Lahadi). Ana tattara bayanai a duk sa'o'in yini kuma an samo su daga API na Kididdigar Amfani da Makamashi.

574.Title: Amfani da Makamashi a Sa'a
574.Description: Taswirar sandar da ke nuna matsakaicin amfani da Watts/Hour na kowace awa ta yini (00h-23h). Ana tattara bayanai a cikin makon da aka zaɓa kuma an samo su daga API ɗin Kididdigar Amfani da Makamashi.

scheduler_preset_action_config_wish.plac: Gwada: "Saita zafin zuwa 22° kuma fara yanayin fitowar rana"
